Text: thx for upload, but you still haven't fixed the connection problems I and others are experiencing while downloading your torrents. The fault is clearly at your end, since no other torrents than yours have connection problems.

@manofhood

it's because he's only using the pirate bay's tracker, which has been offline for a month

add these trackers in and you'll be set:

http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce

I added the extra trackers as suggested using http://torrenteditor.com and now its much faster. I had to edit the torrent because my client wouldn't allow me to add the trackers directly.
